name: Long Term Infrastructure Investors Association
legal: Association under the french law of 1901
goal:
To facilitate and promote private investment in infrastructure which enables long-term, sustainable development of communities, countries and regions.

The Association’s three key priorities at the core of its action: (i) proactive engagement with public stakeholders to support attractive investment frameworks, (ii) development of financial performance benchmarks, and (iii) definition and sharing of best practices in relation to Environmental, Social and Governance issues.
interests: Climate Action, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Taxation, Trade, Transport
